title: Question
description: A question in a questionnaire to be asked to a user

score.description: The numerical score assigned to the question

answer.description: The written response provided by the user to the question

uuid.description: A unique identifier for the question, used to distinguish it from other questions

type.description: The classification of the question, such as multiple choice or open-ended

id.description: A distinct identifier for the question, used to track it within the questionnaire

title.description: The main heading for the text that forms the question being asked in the questionnaire

body.description: The full text of the question to be asked to the user
